hints: The flavor Chocolate is 1 hours before the flavor Strawberry
The toppping Hot Fudge is 2 hours before the flavor Mint
Either The toppping Hot Fudge is the hour 1:00 PM or The flavor Mint is the toppping Cookies
Either the toppping Sprinkles or the flavor Vanilla is the hour 3:00 PM
Either The hour 4:00 PM is the toppping Whipped Cream or The flavor Vanilla is the hour 3:00 PM
The hour 4:00 PM is the toppping Whipped Cream
Either the hour 1:00 PM or the toppping Whipped Cream is the flavor Vanilla
The hour 2:00 PM is not the Mint flavor
